contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of May, 2013, having determined that there is substantial overlap among the issues presented in Friedman v. Corbett, 81 M.D.2013 (Pa.Cmwlth.), and cases which have been accepted for our review per the Court’s extraordinary jurisdiction, see Driscoll v. Corbett, 19 MAP 2013; Tilson v. Corbett, 20 MAP 2013, we also assume plenary jurisdiction over the Friedman v. Corbett case upon our own motion pursuant to 42 Pa.C.S. § 726.
